bwwExcerpt: Despite the fact that Michael Greif, the show's first director, has restaged it, this "Rent" is not a remounting but a true revival, featuring an all-new cast and freshly designed sets by Mark Wendland, whose metal scaffolding echoes the fire-escape motif of Oliver Smith's now-legendary d√©cor for "West Side Story."
